{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-AG300NH |upc=747464112909 |asin=B000NDA6NK |fcc_date=01/09/2007 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTM-190N |manuf_rev=V01 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101479-0 |ic_id=6102A-012 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.3 |pwr_conn=barrel, reverse gender core |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5181 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K8D6316UBM-PI07 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V58C2128164SBI5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, |expansion_minipci_num=2 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, (115200,8,N,1),, J6 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI (long) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8363 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8060 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Gemtek WMIM-211N V02 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI (long) |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8363 |wi2_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip2_model=88W8060 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1112 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1112 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6131 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Octal D-Type transparent latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC573A;;3;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC244A;;1;,,, 3.3V Spread Aware Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress Semiconductor;CY23S05;;1;,,, P-channel Enhancement-mode Power MOSFET;Farnell;AP9435GK;;1;,,, PWM Controller with SCP/DTC Function;Feeling Technology;FP5001;;1;,,, 1MHz, 3A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;3;,,, 1MHz, 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG47E;;2; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;Marvell 1.10.8 |stock_os=Linux;2.4.27-vrs1;Marvell LSP 1.1.1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=XXXXXXXXXXXX_A,XXXXXXXXXXXX_G |default_ssid_regex=^[A-F0-9]{12}_A$,,,^[A-F0-9]{12}_G$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |oui=00:16:01 |oui_eth=00:16:01 }} ''Wireless-N Nfinitiâ„¢ Dual Band Gigabit Router & Access Point''
[http://www.buffalotech.com/products/wireless/single-band-routers/wireless-n-nfiniti-dual-band-gigabit-router-access-point Product page] OEM Gemtek WRTM-190N (WRTM-190N_V01, 190-C04-5500R) One wireless module is a Gemtek WMIM-211N. The default SSID is the wireless interface MAC address followed by '''_A''' and '''_G'''. An example set would be '''0016016F148A_A''' and '''0016016F148A_G'''. [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/29885-buffalo-nfiniti-dual-band-router-double-your-draft-11n-fun Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder] (specs, FCC photos)
[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833162014 On Newegg] (reviews) [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffalo_AirStation Listed on the Buffalo AirStation page on Wikipedia] The power adapter included with the device is a '''Buffalo''' / '''JET''' UIA324-12 (12V, 2A).
